issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw:
Thanks very much for the testing Silvio. I would say that we could be facing different bugs with respect to the yarp specific system plugin and the gzclient alone. Maybe we can open a couple of different issues to handle them and get the gdb traces for each one and any related information using this good boost package?

The ubuntu bug links to changes in boost-mpi but if you read a bit above (comment #9) there is also the link to just boost. Two versions are maintained.
content.html:
Thanks very much for the testing Silvio. I would say that we could be facing different bugs with respect to the yarp specific system plugin and the gzclient alone. Maybe we can open a couple of different issues to handle them and get the gdb traces for each one and any related information using this good boost package?

The ubuntu bug links to changes in boost-mpi but if you read a bit above (comment #9) there is also the link to just boost. Two versions are maintained.
